languages.text: {n}Арджента подходит и кладет руку вам на плечо.{/n} "Да будет так, Вольный Торговец. Перед Патентом, воплощением воли Императора, отмеченным Его собственной рукой, я клянусь не отступиться, пока святыня не будет возвращена, а еретики — наказаны. И да пребудет свет со мной и вами на этом пути!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента подходит и кладет руку вам на плечо.{/n} "Да будет так, Вольный Торговец. Перед Патентом, воплощением воли Императора, отмеченным Его собственной рукой, я клянусь не отступиться, пока святыня не будет возвращена, а еретики — наказаны. И да пребудет свет со мной и вами на этом пути!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента подходит и кладет руку вам на плечо.{/n} "Да будет так, Вольный Торговец. И да пребудет свет со мной и вами на этом пути!"

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔朝你走来，将双手放在你的肩上。{/n}“就这么办吧，行商浪人。我在此，站在帝皇意志的化身之前，站在由祂亲手签发的贸易授状之前。我发誓，我将一刻都不会懈怠，直至夺回圣物，惩处异端为止。愿光明与你我同在！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔朝你走来，将双手放在你的肩上。{/n}“就这么办吧，行商浪人。我在此，站在帝皇意志的化身之前，站在由祂亲手签发的贸易许可证之前。我发誓，我将一刻都不会懈怠，直至夺回圣物，惩处异端为止。愿光明与你我同在！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se acerca a ti y te apoya la mano en el hombro.{/n} «Que así sea, Comerciante Independiente. Juro ante la Patente, que es la voluntad plasmada del Emperador y está marcada por Su mano, que no descansaré hasta haber recuperado la reliquia sagrada y castigado a los herejes. ¡Que la luz nos acompañe a amb{mf|o|a}s en esta tarea!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se acerca a ti y te apoya la mano en el hombro.{/n} «Que así sea, Comerciante Independiente. Juro ante la Patente, que es la voluntad plasmada del Emperador y está marcada por Su mano, que no descansaré hasta haber recuperado la reliquia sagrada y castigado a los herejes. ¡Que la luz nos acompañe a amb{mf|o|a}s en esta tarea!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタが歩み寄り、あなたの肩に手を置く。{/n}「それでいいのです、自由開拓者よ。皇帝の意志を体現し、皇帝の手によって記された令状の前に立つ我は、聖遺物を返し、異端者を罰するまで、決して手を緩めないことを誓います。そして、この道に光が共にあらんことを！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタが歩み寄り、あなたの肩に手を置く。{/n}「それでいいのです、自由開拓者よ。皇帝の意志を体現し、皇帝の手によって記された令状の前に立つ我は、聖遺物を返し、異端者を罰するまで、決して手を緩めないことを誓います。そして、この道に光が共にあらんことを！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta tritt an dich heran und legt dir ihre Hand auf die Schulter.{/n} "So sei es, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. So wie ich hier vor dem Handelsbrief stehe, der Verkörperung des Willens des Imperators, signiert von seiner eigenen Hand, schwöre ich hiermit, dass ich nicht nachlassen werde, bis das heilige Relikt zurückgebracht ist und die Ketzer bestraft sind. Und möge das Licht auf diesem Pfad mit uns beiden sein!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta tritt an dich heran und legt dir ihre Hand auf die Schulter.{/n} "So sei es, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. So wie ich hier vor dem Handelsbrief stehe, der Verkörperung des Willens des Imperators, signiert von seiner eigenen Hand, schwöre ich hiermit, dass ich nicht nachlassen werde, bis das heilige Relikt zurückgebracht ist und die Ketzer bestraft sind. Und möge das Licht auf diesem Pfad mit uns beiden sein!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta s'approche de vous et pose une main sur votre épaule.{/n} « Qu'il en soit ainsi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Devant la lettre de marque, l'incarnation de la volonté de l'Empereur marquée par Sa propre main, je jure de faire tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour retrouver la relique sacrée et châtier les hérétiques. Que la lumière nous accompagne {mf|tous|toutes} les deux sur cette voie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta s'approche de vous et pose une main sur votre épaule.{/n} « Qu'il en soit ainsi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Devant la lettre de marque, l'incarnation de la volonté de l'Empereur marquée par Sa propre main, je jure de faire tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour retrouver la relique sacrée et châtier les hérétiques. Que la lumière nous accompagne {mf|tous|toutes} les deux sur cette voie ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta sana yaklaşıyor. Ardından elini kaldırıp omzuna koyuyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ Hür Tacir. İmparator'un iradesinin somut yansıması olan bu Ruhsatname'nin huzurunda, kutsal yadigâr yuvasına dönene ve kâfirler cezasını çekene kadar durmayacağıma ant içerim. İmparator'un ışığı yolumuzu aydınlatsın!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta walks up and places her hand on your shoulder.{/n} "So be it, Rogue Trader. As I stand here before the Warrant, the embodiment of the Emperor's will marked by His own hand, I vow that I will not relent until the holy relic has been returned and the heretics punished. And may the light be with us both on this path!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta sana yaklaşıyor. Ardından elini, senin omzuna koyuyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ Hür Tacir. İmparator'un iradesinin somut yansıması olan bu Ruhsatnamenin huzurunda, kutsal yadigâr yuvasına dönene ve kâfirler cezasını çekene kadar durmayacağıma ant içerim. İmparator'un ışığı yolumuzu aydınlatsın!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
